Laughably incompetent developers. They genuinely cant do anything right. The game is fun at its core but the developers seem to be doing everything in their power to prevent that fun from being accessed by the playerbase. The best current example is their new "skill based" matchmaking, which basically makes half of your matches almost exactly like before if a little sweatier, and the other half absolutely terrible and unenjoable sweatfests with no fun to be had. This game is full of these "improvements" that make the game even less fun to play.

超级好玩，刚开始玩还觉得有点吓人，但是后来玩的好点了，觉得溜屠夫特别搞笑，哈哈哈，我的蛇皮走位简直是秀翻了，每次以为自己要死了，结果我还能活到最后居然还逃生成功了，每一局形势都不一样，遇到的队友和杀手都不一样，大家的技能也不一样，特别有意思，从头到尾都是惊心动魄的感觉，玩这个游戏也不需要花什么钱，真的是良心游戏阿，真的爱了~

ММ просто отвратителен
Если у вас есть товарищи которые что-то знают или вы готовы смотреть гайды на ютубе то добро пожаловать.
А так вас постоянно будет кидать к людям, которые уже наиграли 100+ часов и у которых все перки третьего уровня.
Игра еще ни разу не поставила меня к игрокам моего уровня, очень интересно играть проигрывая в салат первые 5 часов, прям супер интересно.
Поиск матча при этом занимает достаточно длительное время.
UPD

At this moment I can't reccomend the game. It is fun, don't get me wrong, but matchmaking and bug that prevents gaining points used to level up character will make you frustrated a lot. Avoid for now, at least until they repair the matchmaking

EDIT:
Yeah a year after that review game's matchmaking is still extremely bad, grind is awful and the game is really not friendly to new players. Playing the killer is the worst thing you can do with your time. Most of the time it feels like being in a sitcom where 4 kids bully and annoy you while you keep stumbling your way through the match, just for them to teabag you at the exit gate. Stay away, don't get trapped by these devs.

EDIT OF EDIT:
And now they endorse and work with NFTs. They are literally endorsing destroying the climate and are directly funding possibility of you and your children living in a world that is exploited to its limits. If that doesn't deter you then I don't know what else to say. They should be banned from steam.

-Recomiendo este juego? Si
-Es buen juego? Discutible
 Voy a aclarar un par de cosas, este juego da terror, en otro sentido. Tiene ideas que funcionan muy bien de la mano, persecución, sigilo, altruismo y cooperación. Sin embargo no funciona como debería:
1- Matchmaking:
 Siendo superviviente casi siempre tenes que carrear al equipo, pero en asesino es lo peor. El desnivel que hay entre los supervivientes y el asesino casi siempre es la causa de todos los enojos, ya sea porque los supervivientes son de un nivel bajo que aburre, o tan alto que parecen invencibles.
2- Bugs:
 El juego viene con este problema desde sus inicios, tiene demasiados bugs que mayormente no afectan tanto al gameplay, pero algunos arruinan totalmente la experiencia.
3- Cheaters:
 No son muy frecuentes, pero cuando hay una ola de cheaters (tramposos que usan herramientas externas) los desarrolladores se demoran una cantidad de tiempo excesiva en buscar el problema y arreglarlo, aunque en este punto no los culpo.

 Conclusión: Dentro de todo el juego es disfrutable, recibe actualizaciones de contenido frecuentemente y si jugás con amigos es pura risa
Минус пару кружек и тетрадка, но классная игрушка, тут без аргументов топ.

Its a realy fun game once you get somewhat good, however, i have 2 problems, the matchmaking, and the perks. when i started playing the FIRST game i played was with a comp player, i got actually ROLLED. and the perks, omg the perks, so dead by daylight is the ONLY game that i play as the killer that i felt absolutely helpless againts SURVIVORS. there are so many perks that give them an advantage, dont even get me started on the flashlight....

Edit: The first review i made when i was angry, sorry about that lol. the more i played the more i realized that only a select few perks are actually broken, the rest are...well kinda useless tbh. When you are doing good it's fun! And I mean my first review was pretty harsh and for some reason I made the flashlight sound like the worst thing on earth? Not sure why, but again the game isnt that bad but its not the best either.
